displayName.zh_CN: 标签增强 - 快速标注与搜索

description.default: A powerful tag management plugin for SiYuan. Quick tag insertion with 8 preset tags, click to search, and support multiple search scopes.
description.en_US: A powerful tag management plugin for SiYuan. Quick tag insertion with 8 preset tags, click to search, and support multiple search scopes.
description.zh_CN: 强大的标签管理插件，支持快速添加8种预设标签、点击标签智能搜索、多范围搜索，助力知识管理。
